name: ConstrucTetris
description:
The long awaited ConstructeTetris is finally here!

-Rules-

You get points by creating closed off areas with Tetris blocks. The larger the better. The points are calculated by the end of the game.

-Controls-

z/x : rotate left/right

Arrow keys : move the block

r : restart the game

Space : Ends the game early. Only for bug testing. Don't touch. I will be very disappointed in you.

When the game ends, you can press any button to restart.

Also, for some reason the game runs like shit in web browsers, and it feels really bad to play. You should probably just download the standalone version below.
